name: Branching Corpses: Legacy
description:
Hey there!

This game is part of the Branching Corpses project. Branching Corpses is a community made game series where you can extend the story!

To leran more about it and start at the beginning, click here!

Endings in this game:

  • A: You win [NO GAME FOR THIS ENDING YET, YOU COULD MAKE IT!]
  • B: The Monster King wins [NO GAME FOR THIS ENDING YET, YOU COULD MAKE IT!]
  • C: Nobody wins [NO GAME FOR THIS ENDING YET, YOU COULD MAKE IT!]

Credits

This game was made using the Godot Engine, as well as FL Studio 20 for the music and BFXR. Some assets were taken from this dungeon tileset, from the Branching Corpses Discord and their respective uploaders, and from Kevin MacLeod.

Obligatory Kevin MacLeod license thingy
